Subject: 'Users of Heritrix' Wiki Page
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=WlGk5qOt9RAQMZTpdjPZNGcWYoYDKR1ckUW_UwXjus-A

I've created a page on our project wiki where groups using Heritrix may 
list themselves:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Users+of+Heritrix

If you're comfortable being identified as a group using Heritrix, please 
add a bullet for your organization or project. Including a link to a 
page with more information about your Heritrix-using project, or the 
service fed with Heritrix-crawled content, is welcome.

(I know of many groups -- but would prefer people opt-in and list 
themselves, rather than presuming they're OK for me to list and describe.)

If I have the categories wrong, feel free to reword or reorder -- it's a 
wiki, be bold!

Thanks,

- Gordon @ IA
